p: The nuclear magnetic resonance spectrometer (Bruker Advance III 600); AL-104 electronic analytical balance (Cixi Tiandong Weighing Apparatus Factory); KQ-500B ultrasonic cleaning instrument (Shenzhen Dekang Technology Co., Ltd.); rotary evaporator R-101N (Zhengzhou Great Wall Science and Industry Co., Ltd.); and constant temperature water bath (Jiangsu Zhengji Co., Ltd.) were used.
